com.mapzen.tangram

Class MapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.tangram.MapData

  • public class MapData
extends java.lang.Object
    MapData is a named collection of drawable map features.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addFeature(Geometry geometry)
      Add a geometry feature to this data collection
      MapData addGeoJson(java.lang.String data)
      Add features described in a GeoJSON string to this collection.
      MapData addPoint(LngLat point, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Add a point feature to this collection.
      MapData addPolygon(java.util.List<java.util.List<LngLat>> polygon, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Add a polygon feature to this collection.
      MapData addPolyline(java.util.List<LngLat> polyline, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
      Add a polyline feature to this collection.
      MapData clear()
      Remove all features from this collection.
      java.lang.String name()
      Get the name of this MapData.
      void remove()
      Remove this MapData from the map it is currently associated with.

    • Method Detail

      • addFeature

        protected void addFeature(Geometry geometry)
        Add a geometry feature to this data collection
        Parameters:
        geometry - The feature to add

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Get the name of this MapData.
        Returns:
        The name.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Remove this MapData from the map it is currently associated with. After remove is called, this object can no longer apply changes to the map.

      • addPoint

        public MapData addPoint(LngLat point,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Add a point feature to this collection.
        Parameters:
        point - The coordinates of the feature.
        properties - The properties of the feature, used for filtering and styling according to the scene file used by the map; may be null.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.

      • addPolyline

        public MapData addPolyline(java.util.List<LngLat> polyline,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Add a polyline feature to this collection.
        Parameters:
        polyline - A list of coordinates that define the line segments of the feature.
        properties - The properties of the feature, used for filtering and styling according to the scene file used by the map; may be null.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.

      • addPolygon

        public MapData addPolygon(java.util.List<java.util.List<LngLat>> polygon,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        Add a polygon feature to this collection.
        Parameters:
        polygon - A list of rings describing the shape of the feature. Each ring is a list of coordinates. The first ring is taken as the "exterior" of the polygon and rings with opposite winding are considered "holes".
        properties - The properties of the feature, used for filtering and styling according to the scene file used by the map; may be null.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.

      • addGeoJson

        public MapData addGeoJson(java.lang.String data)
        Add features described in a GeoJSON string to this collection.
        Parameters:
        data - A string containing a GeoJSON FeatureCollection
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.

      • clear

        public MapData clear()
        Remove all features from this collection.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.
